thread.title: Comments closing: I totally disagree
thread.title_full: Comments closing: I totally disagree | News24

author: news24.com
title: Comments closing: I totally disagree
text: I totally disagree with decision to close comments,other site put controls by monitoring vulgar comments. What stop News24 to block people they c doing such behaviour. Wake up News24 n do what's right by not closing comments. Some ppl one thing for sure they do it to open debate n don't mean any harm. I don't remember getting some attack from such comments like other site of naughtiness. I hope ul respect d readers unhappiness n don't close dem,dis apps is not about News24 only is about readers.
